alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:34PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Palm Beach County through 215 PM EDT... At 133 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near North County Airport to 8 miles northwest of The Acreage to 6 miles east of Okeelanta. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Belle Glade, Pahokee, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Canal Point, Okeelanta, Belle Glade Camp, North County Airport, Fremd Village-Padgett Island, The Acreage, Philo Farms, Limestone Creek, Caloosa and Jupiter Farms. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons participating in outdoor activities should seek sturdy shelter until these storms pass. Open shelters found in parks, beaches, or golf courses offer no protection from the dangers of lightning.
